DOC.brief_summary: This project set describe objective measure range motion weight-bearing ability distal radioulnar joint one five year primary implantation Scheker total distal radioulnar joint prosthesis.The range motion stability distal radioulnar joint ( DRUJ ) important outcome preserve function , especially pronation supination . Unlike ulnar endoprostheses replace ulnar head , Scheker prosthesis replaces ulnar head , resurface less sigmoid notch , semi-constrained design .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Radiographical Analysis Distal Radioulnar Joint Following Implantation Scheker Total Distal Radioulnar Joint Prosthesis
DOC.criteria: Patient treat Scheker total distal radioulnar joint prosthesis followup time 12 60 month primary implantation Patient willing able give write informed consent participate study Exclusion criterion : Inflammatory disease ( e.g . rheumatoid arthritis ) Pregnant woman German language barrier complete questionnaires Any disease process would preclude accurate evaluation ( e.g . neuromuscular , psychiatric metabolic disorder ) Legal incompetence Participation medical device medicinal product study within previous month could influence result present study
